pr_title: Name public network appropriately to avoid conflicts

timeline.message: Name public network appropriately to avoid conflicts

timeline.bodyText: @Pearl1594 would that be wrong or cause compatibility issues post upgrade? Generally port group names don't end in period (.) cc @PaulAngus @andrijapanicsb @borisstoyanov @vladimirpetrov?
timeline.author: rhtyd

replies.bodyText: @rhtyd the naming convention as seen in the vcenter/mob is cloud.public.prim_vlanid.secondary_vlanid.network_rate.vswitchname so, I believe, it shouldn't cause any issue.
replies.author: Pearl1594

replies.bodyText: Ah okay, in that case this LGTM - but please also check where the method getPublicNetworkNamePrefix is used if it could cause any regressions?
